citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the program of veterinary care, contingency plan, record of animals on hand, and records of
acquisition and disposition were not available for review by the inspector. Review of records required by the Animal
Welfare Act facilitates the inspection process by allowing the inspector to determine compliance of documents and
evaluate animal welfare. The facility shall ensure that records required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and the
regulations are available for APHIS officials to review on all inspections.
Correct by: January 16,2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection, the program of veterinary care, contingency plan, record of animals on hand, and records of 
acquisition and disposition were not available for review by the inspector. Review of records required by the Animal 
Welfare Act facilitates the inspection process by allowing the inspector to determine compliance of documents and 
evaluate animal welfare. The facility shall ensure that records required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and the 
regulations are available for APHIS officials to review on all inspections. 
 
 
Correct by: January 16,2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
